{"id":1278340281,"question_id":3444,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week","timestamp":1717582383,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"607 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1278340281/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Number of Good Pairs II","memory":"65.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long numberOfPairs(int[] nums1, int[] nums2, int k) {\n\n        //find # of good pair\n        // good pair 定義是 n1 可以被n2*k 整除 =>k是假議題 直接全乘到n2上\n        // ＝> n1 = x * n2 => (n1大 n2小) => 從n1的質因數找n2\n\n\n        Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        for(int n2 : nums2){\n            int val = n2 * k;\n            map.put(val, map.getOrDefault(val, 0) + 1);\n        }\n\n        long ans=0;\n        for(int n1 : nums1){\n            for(int j=1; j*j<=n1; j++){ // 找因數 從1開始找到平方為止\n                \n                if(n1%j==0){\n                    if(map.containsKey(j)){\n                        ans += map.get(j);\n                    }\n\n                    int val=n1/j; // 直接再找一層, 如果相同 ex:25=5*5的不要重複算\n                    if(j!=val && map.containsKey(val)){\n                        ans += map.get(val);\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-number-of-good-pairs-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
